caption:
“Not by might, but by My Spirit.” — Zechariah 4:6

Reflection:
Strength fades, but Spirit endures. The greatest victories are not won by hands, but by hearts aligned with heaven.

Commentary:
This verse reminds us that divine power surpasses human effort. True success flows through surrender, not domination.
